result.execSummary:
Christopher D Thurmond was extradited to another county, state or jurisdiction. Extradition means Christopher D Thurmond was accused or convicted of an offense in another county, state or jurisdiction and was taken there to face their charge(s) or conviction.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Christopher D Thurmond

defendant.name: Thurmond, Christopher D
defendant.address: 5336 North Lovers Lane Road, Milwaukee, WI 53208

records.addlTxt: Attorney Nathan Francis Opland-Dobs appeared by video for Christopher D Thurmond.  Attorney Karine O'Byrne appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant has arrived in Minnesota per MCSO - Extradition Unit. On motion of the state, Court ordered case closed.

Attorney Robert J Hampton in court.  Karine O'Byrne appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Attorney appeared by video means for.  Defendant has been transported to Dane County.  At request of State, Court adjourns matter for another status date pending extradition from Dane County to Minnesota.  Status conference scheduled for September 12, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Attorney David Thomas Conley in court.  Michael J. Odden appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Status Conference held.  Defendant's pending matter (21CF4907) calendared for Plea/Sentencing on August  5, 2022 in Branch 25.  Court adjourns matter.  Court continues order that defendant be REMANDED into the custody of the Milwaukee County Sheriff's Department.  Status conference scheduled for August 22, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Alexander James Geocaris appeared for Michael Staskunas the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Christopher D Thurmond in court with attorney Arial Jade Rosenberg.  Defendant Christopher D Thurmond in custody.  Court found the defendant is the person wanted in the State of Minnesota. Defendant withdraws his request to contest extradition. Defendant waived extradition.  Signed Waiver of Extradition received and filed.  Court ordered the defendant REMANDED into the custody of the Milwaukee County Sheriff's Department.

Defendant Christopher D Thurmond in court with attorney Arial Jade Rosenberg.  Defendant Christopher D Thurmond in custody.  Michael R Staskunas appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Christopher D Thurmond appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Reserve Judge Franke, Branch 25.
Court reviewed complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of rights and right to file a Writ of Habeas Corpus.  Court found the defendant is the person wanted in the State of Minnesota.  Defendant contested extradition.  Court ordered Defendant REMANDED into the custody of the Milwaukee County Sheriff's Department.  Status conference scheduled for August 1, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Branch 45 Judge Kies will hear this matter for Branch 25 due to the court being in Jury trial.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
